data.name: Alexandra for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Alexandra is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Hailing from Helsinki, Finland, Alexandra attended boarding school and is a talented horse rider who won rosettes in showjumping.

Alexandra first started working in the adult entertainment industry as an exotic dancer and she used to perform at many different strip clubs. Alexandra has also appeared as a presenter on the Finnish adult TV program. Alexandra first decided to pursue a career as a prostitute after a friend of hers introduced her to the industry. First she worked as en escort girl for very rich clients and traveled a lot with her employers.

Alexandra traveled a lot in China, Japan and Thailand and felt in love in Asiatic culture. This is why she decided to display some elements on those countries on her body. Now the main part of Alexandra's body is inked and she is really proud of it. Alexandra is sure that with all those colorful tattoo her body is perfect and very sexy.

Now Alexandra want to be a prostitute.

Help Alexandra to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Alexandra is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
